name: ratelimiter
title: Rate Limiter
description: Limits the rate a which a service is called

settings.name: limit
settings.description: Limit can be specifed in the format of "limit-period". Valid periods are 'S', 'M' & 'H' to represent Second, Minute & Hour. Example: "10-S" represents 10 request/second

settings.name: spikeThreshold
settings.description: Multiple above base traffic load which triggers the spike block logic. Spike blocking is disabled by default.

settings.name: decayRate
settings.description: Exponential decay rate for the spike blocking probability. Default .01

input.name: token
input.description: Token for which rate limit has to be applied

output.name: error
output.description: If any error occured while applying the rate limit
